channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: ‘Get Grok Gone’: Advocacy groups demand Apple and Google block X from app stores
item.description: X is awash with nonconsensual sexual deepfakes that blatantly violate Apple's and Google's policies, yet it and xAI's Grok remain on both companies' app stores. In open letters published Wednesday, a coalition of 28 advocacy groups, including women's organizations and tech watchdogs, are demanding CEOs Tim Cook and Sundar Pichai grow spines and evict them. […]...

item.title: Spotify is hiking prices again
item.description: The price of Spotify Premium is about to jump again in the US, marking its third price hike since 2023. Spotify announced that subscribers in the US, Estonia, and Latvia will be contacted about the updated pricing over the coming month. Individual Premium plans in the US will increase from $11.99 to $12.99 by the […]

item.title: ISS mission splashes down after medical issue
item.description: The SpaceX Dragon spacecraft carrying the Crew-11 astronauts has splashed down into the ocean after they left the ISS a month earlier than planned due a medical issue. It’s the first time NASA cut a mission short due to a medical concern. The agency didn’t name the crew member and their condition but stated that they were stable and that it wasn’t a case of medical evacuation. NASA merely decided to end the mission early out of an abundance of caution, because the ISS didn’t have the tools for a proper diagnosis. NASA astronauts Mike Fincke and Zena Cardman, JAXA’s Kimiya Yui and Russian cos...

item.title: Making Funny ‘Fallout 4’ Mods Is Way Better Than Making ‘Good’ Fallout 4 Mods
item.description: Featuring flying toilet plungers, Lovecraftian NPCs, and a murderous animated cutout of Todd Howard.

item.title: What Is VO2 Max? Here’s What You Need to Know About the Longevity Metric (2026)
item.description: VO2 max can predict cardiorespiratory health and longevity, but only if you understand what the number can and can’t tell you.

item.title: Crew-11 vient de rentrer sur Terre plus tôt que prévu, une première dans l’histoire de l’ISS
item.description: La mission Crew-11 s'est achevée de manière précipitée après le signalement d'un membre d'équipage malade. Les quatre astronautes sont arrivés sur Terre ce matin en bonne santé apparente et aucun souci n'est à signaler.

item.title: After Italy, WhatsApp excludes Brazil from rival chatbot ban
item.description: WhatsApp is allowing AI providers to continue offering their chatbots to users in Brazil, days after the country's competition agency ordered the company to suspend its new policy that bars third-party, general-purpose chatbots from the app.

item.title: Pax8 accidentally exposes partner data - 1,800 MSPs have customer info and licensing details exposed
item.description: A Pax8 employee sent an email with the wrong attachment to roughly 40 recipients.

item.title: Rockstar court representative says studio fired GTA 6 developers for discussing a 'top secret' 32-player online mode in private Discord, which it was 'gravely concerned' to have discovered
item.description: New court documents reveal that Rockstar fired the 30+ GTA 6 developers in October 2025 for allegedly discussing a 32-player online mode in a private Discord channel.

item.title: Galaxy AI payant en 2026 ? Samsung a discrètement changé les règles en octobre
item.description: C’est la fin officielle de l'incertitude. Alors que l'échéance de fin 2025 inquiétait, Samsung a mis à jour ses conditions d'utilisation. L'IA reste gratuite, et en France, c'est acté depuis l'automne.

item.title: I was ready to buy Ricoh’s incredibly niche black-and-white compact camera — but then I saw the price and it’s an absolute dealbreaker
item.description: Ricoh unveils its first black-and-white only camera in its GR series of premium digital compacts – the GR IV Monochrome, which is otherwise essentially identical to the GR IV

item.title: They Built a Full-Sized Boat for Guillermo del Toro’s ‘Frankenstein’
item.description: See how it went down in this new video about the Netflix film starring Oscar Isaac and Jacob Elordi.

item.title: Livestream: Welcome to the Chinese Century
item.description: Join our livestream — and pose a question to WIRED’s panel of experts — on China’s dominance, influence, and how it is rewriting the future.

item.title: Hundreds of Millions of Audio Devices Need a Patch to Prevent Wireless Hacking and Tracking
item.description: Flaws in how 17 models of headphones and speakers use Google’s one-tap Fast Pair Bluetooth protocol have left devices open to eavesdroppers and stalkers.

item.title: The Tea App Is Back With a New Website
item.description: Months after major data leaks, the app where women leave Yelp-style reviews about men is relaunching with a new website. It’s not back on iOS, but the Android app has new AI features.

item.title: All the news that’s fit to WhatsApp
item.description: The WeChat channel 纽约移民记事网Documented (or the New York Immigrant Chronicle) is part newsfeed and part public service. The channel, run by the nonprofit newsroom Documented NYC, is filled with local news for Chinese speakers in New York: stories about healthcare and immigration arrests, but also information on local events like toy giveaways, places where families […]...

item.title: Indian SpaceX rival EtherealX hits 5x valuation as it readies engine tests
item.description: EtherealX is ramping engine tests and building a 150-acre rocket campus in India as it targets a 2027 launch mission.

item.title: This old Pennsylvania coal town could get a reboot from AI
item.description: At its peak, the Homer City power plant employed hundreds of people and could deploy enough to power 2 million homes. As the September evening inched along, the line of residents waiting their turn for the microphone held steady. Filing down the auditorium aisles at the Indiana University of Pennsylvania, they were armed with questions about a new gas plant slated for their community....

item.title: Amazon slashes the price of the Blink Mini to a ridiculously low £9.99
item.description: The Blink Mini is a simple to use security camera that's perfect if you want to keep an eye on anything happening at home – and it's now down to a super-low price on Amazon.

item.title: Unable to access Microsoft Cloud PC? This could be why - and a fix is on the way
item.description: Microsoft says it's aware of a Microsoft 365 Cloud PC issue with the latest Windows 10 and Windows 11 builds.

item.title: Go goblin mode by grabbing the first two Styx games at no cost and then try the free new demo for the third
item.description: Get your goblin on with two free Styx games via the Epic Games Store, then prepare for the next installment with a new demo.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel has a blunt response to the latest Greenland talks
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel has shared his thoughts on the Trump administration's latest talks to try and acquire Greenland.

item.title: Fuite de données au Service Public : des « pièces justificatives » et des identifiants ont été compromis
item.description: Service-public.gouv.fr, le portail pour les démarches administratives en ligne, vient d’être victime d'une fuite de données. Suite à un incident chez un sous-traitant, des identifiants et des documents sensibles ont été compromis.

item.title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 15 5G : le nouveau champion de l’entrée de gamme est déjà en promo lors des soldes
item.description: La nouvelle fournée de smartphones d'entrée de gamme Xiaomi vient de sortir, et le Redmi Note 15 5G se trouve déjà à prix cassé : 229 euros contre 279 euros de base. Une aubaine pour les petits budgets qui cherchent un smartphone pas cher pendant les soldes.

item.title: Google Horloge : ce geste que vous aimiez tant ferait enfin son grand retour
item.description: L'application Horloge de Google s'apprête à ramener un geste pour éteindre le réveil que beaucoup d'utilisateurs regrettent.

item.title: The Real AI Talent War Is for Plumbers and Electricians
item.description: The AI boom is driving an unprecedented wave of data center construction, but there aren’t enough skilled tradespeople in the US to keep up.

item.title: Asus ROG Falcata Review: A Split Gaming Keyboard
item.description: With the looks and speed of a gaming keyboard and the comfort of an ergonomic keyboard, the Falcata is a unique and expensive hybrid for a niche audience.

item.title: ‘People need to ask more of their buildings’: 6 ideas that will define architecture in 2026
item.description: Top architects tell Fast Company what to expect in the next year, from more organic shapes to buildings that foster trust. What shape could buildings take in 2026?

item.title: Can you figure out the hidden meaning of this Frank Lloyd Wright logo?
item.description: Designed for the Frank Lloyd Wright Building Conservancy, the new logo gives Wright’s iconic square new symbolism. Nearly 500 buildings designed by Wright were built during his lifetime, but almost 15% of those have been demolished or lost through neglect, according to the Frank Lloyd Wright Building Conservancy, an organization that works to preserve the famed architect’s work...

item.title: Amazon multiplie les offres à la 2e démarque des soldes : le TOP 18 des deals
item.description: Pendant les soldes d’hiver, Amazon ne garde pas toutes ses bonnes affaires pour les membres Prime : tout le monde peut profiter des réductions du géant américain. Découvrez ici les meilleures offres à ne pas manquer lors de la deuxième démarque.

item.title: The Hannspree Lumo is the world’s first dynamic paper tablet – combining a full Android experience with all the benefits of an e-reader
item.description: The Hannspree Lumo has a paper-like display but tablet-like specs, so it's easy on your eyes but still runs Android apps.

item.title: On a trouvé le premier smartphone de Dreame caché dans une présentation
item.description: Au détour d'une présentation du CES 2026, Dreame a laissé traîner une slide. Le constructeur chinois prépare son premier smartphone, le Air1.

item.title: Is the Coros Apex 4 battery life a competitive advantage for multi-day events?
item.description: Is the Coros Apex 4 battery life a competitive advantage in multi-day training? Features, price, and where to buy.

item.title: Les batteries silicium-carbone : on vous explique tout sur la révolution discrète des smartphones
item.description: Le silicium, élément abondant sur Terre, pourrait bien résoudre l'un des problèmes les plus persistants de nos smartphones : l'autonomie limitée. Voici pourquoi cette technologie silicium-carbone change la donne.

item.title: Pas donné et lent à recharger : le pari risqué du Suzuki e Vitara, la première voiture électrique de la marque
item.description: Dévoilé en fin d’année 2024, le Suzuki e Vitara a pris son temps pour arriver en France. Mais voilà que la nouvelle voiture électrique du constructeur japonais est enfin disponible à la commande.

item.title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT translator challenges Google Translate
item.description: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Translate, a standalone web translation tool that supports over 50 languages and is positioned as a direct competitor to Google Translate. The two services look visually similar: both feature two text boxes - one for typing or pasting the source text and another that displays the translated results - alongside dropdown […]...

item.title: Volvo EX60 : on a creusé HuginCore, et ce n’est pas (que) du marketing
item.description: Pour son EX60, Volvo centralise tout dans son HuginCore, un cerveau numérique de 250 TOPS. Marketing ou réelle avancée ? On fait le point.

item.title: Everything you need to remember before Bridgerton Season 4
item.description: Who married whom in "Bridgerton" Season 3? What went down at that ball? And where's Lady Whistledown at?

item.title: AWS brings ‘Sovereign’ cloud to Europe - you can pause your geopatriation plans, for now
item.description: Your geopatriation dreams come true, thanks to new AWS sovereign cloud.

item.title: The Pokémon TCG: Collector Chest is down to market value on Amazon
item.description: The Fall 2025 edition of the Pokémon TCG Collector's Chest is down to almost market price, with six boosters, promo cards, and more for only $37.

item.title: Fans think there's even more evidence suggesting that an Assassin's Creed Black Flag remake is on the way — but the real explanation is a lot less exciting
item.description: Fans think that there's now even more evidence pointing to an Assassin's Creed Black Flag remake as parts of the game's soundtrack appear on YouTube.

item.title: Quel forfait mobile pour les États-Unis ? Nos conseils pour communiquer et rester connecté
item.description: Vous avez prévu un voyage aux États-Unis, mais vous vous demandez comment vous allez pouvoir communiquer avec vos proches restés en France sans en payer le prix fort ? On vous donne ici nos recommandations et les forfaits qui vous sauveront des frais d'itinérance.

item.title: Is Elon Musk losing the space cellphone war?
item.description: Starlink has a head start, but other satellite competitors are clamoring for the chance to own the future of the internet. The fiercest space race is not about getting back to the moon—it’s about allowing you to post a TikTok or watch Netflix on your phone anywhere around the globe, from the Atacama Salt Flats to the Khongor sand dunes in the Gobi Desert. To make this happen, two distinct design philosophies are at war, as companies build out the infrastructure needed to ensure every phone on the planet is permanently connected to the internet. ...

item.title: Clean energy is still booming in the U.S. despite Trump’s best efforts
item.description: New wind and solar power is still growing, even in the face of political uncertainty and the ending of federal policies designed to help grow renewables. A year after President Trump took office, clean energy is still growing in the U.S. In 2025, nearly all new power added to the grid came from solar, wind, and batteries. In September, for example, solar made up 98% of new capacity. And in 2026, the U.S. Energy Administration projects that all net new generating capacity will come from renewable energy and batteries....

item.title: How to go from chief executive to chief envisioner
item.description: Reimaging the role of the CEO. Let’s do a thought exercise. If the role of the chief marketing officer is to oversee marketing and the role of the chief operating officer is to oversee operations, while the chief financial officer’s responsibility is to safeguard the organization’s finances, then what’s the responsibility of the chief executive officer? Surely, it’s more than overseeing executions or leading executives, yet the “CEO” naming convention doesn’t give much insight as to what the role is or what it’s responsible for. This gets even more convoluted when an organization has both a CE...

item.title: Exclusive: Beyond pivots again, this time with a sports recovery drink
item.description: CEO Ethan Brown tells ‘Fast Company’ how the new line, Immerse—which is pumped with plant-based protein, fiber, and more—is a logical next step. Fifty minutes into a training session at a gym in lower Manhattan, I’m doing burpees and clean-and-jerks while Beyond Meat CEO Ethan Brown—all 6 feet, 5 inches of him—is bear-crawling into pushups, then slamming a medicine ball to the ground from overhead....

item.title: Forza Horizon 6 could launch sooner than you think, if reports of a strange advertisement seen in Forza Horizon 5 are to be believed
item.description: Forza Horizon 6 might be out as early as May, though one detail from this leak - allegedly found in Forza Horizon 5 - has me concerned.

item.title: Rockstar has launched its own mod marketplace ahead of the launch of Grand Theft Auto 6
item.description: Rockstar Games has launched its own website dedicated to the buying and selling of GTA Online and Red Dead Online mods, called the Cfx Marketplace.

item.title: GOTY contender Kingdom Come: Deliverance II is now only $40
item.description: Accalimed RPG 'Kingdom Come: Deliverance II' is now only $39.97 with 33% knocked off its usual listing price of $59.99 on Amazon.

item.title: 'We're actively developing it': Marvel producer confirms one of the worst-rated MCU TV shows is edging closer to getting a second season on Disney+
item.description: Marvel's Head of TV and Animation has provided a major update on the future of adult animated show Marvel Zombies.
